name: Undertale Genocide Papyrus Battle
description:
CONTROLS:
-Arrow keys to move
-Z to select
-X to deselect
Up arrow key to jump (blue mode).

CREDIT GOES TO TOBY FOX CREATOR OF UNDERTALE!!!

You killed all the souls even sans, but now papyrus will stop that! Dodge attacks and have good strategy to defeat THE GREAT PAPYRUS!
